name: Please! No more bags FREE
description:
Holiday-time has come and the airport conveyor belts have a lot of work to do. Your mission is to help the pios by dragging each suitcase to the respective conveyor belt for each destination and travel the world in an adventure where each level has something new with just the right amount of fun and difficulty to encourage you to carry on playing.

SIMPLE, INTUITIVE MULTITOUCH CONTROLS
Using your finger, drag the suitcase to the right belt, it couldn't be any easier. What's more, if you use more than one finger at one time you can make acrobatic movements to increase your score.

AN ADVENTURE THAT IS FULL OF SURPRISES
You'll visit many cities where new mechanics will be revealed that pose a new challenge: suitcases that catch fire, belts that change direction, X-rays, portals, etc.

WEEKLY ONLINE TOURNAMENTS
Compete every week to be the best and win prizes if you do.

POWER-UPS
The pios you obtain while playing allow you to purchase power-ups that will help you at more complicated levels.
